lenders.occupational_info: I teach first grade (6-7 year olds) and believe in lifelong learning.  I believe in my children and their dreams!

In addition, my sweet new husband and brothers-in-law are so cool, progressive and all-around amazing men that they agreed to support Kiva in lue of Christmas presents.

The Next Speaker mediates between those speakers and companies that would like to learn about the latest developments.

lenders.occupational_info:

In essence, we're writers for hire, and we commit a percentage of every dollar we earn in profit to Kiva.
